text: Andy McKee is a fingerstyle guitarist from Topeka, Kansas. He became famous through his YouTube videos in 2006. ==Discography== * Nocturne, 2001 * Dreamcatcher, 2004 * Art of Motion, 2005 * Gates of Gnomeria, 2007 * Split DVD with Antoine Dufour, 2007 * The Thing That Came From Somewhere with Don Ross, 2008 ==Other Webs√≠tes== * McKee's Personal Website * Andy McKee's MySpace * McKee @ Candyrat Records * Interview @ InstruMentalCase * Profile from honesttune.com. title: Andy McKee
